title: Jim Rose’s Website
text:
Hello! This is where I’m building my personal website using Quarto.


I’m a PhD candidate at Emory University studying Genetics & Molecular biology. I work on autoimmunity and gene regulation of the immune system using the tools of computational biology.
I’m a self-taught coder who works primarily in R on a daily basis, but I’ve also branched out to a few other languages and tools. I’ve got a particular interest in applying a deeper understanding of statistics to laboratory experiments as well as data visualization.




Next generation sequencing data analysis

RNAseq, ATACseq, single-cell sequencing, whole-genome sequencing

Data Visualization

All things ggplot..trying my hand at a little Javascript/Observable/D3 recently

Applying biological know-how to design good questions for large complex data analysis
Gene regulatory network analysis
Epigenetics

title: Jim Rose’s Website
text:
About Me
I’m a PhD candidate at Emory University studying Genetics & Molecular biology. I work on autoimmunity and gene regulation of the immune system using the tools of computational biology.
I’m a self-taught coder who works primarily in R on a daily basis, but I’ve also branched out to a few other languages and tools. I’ve got a particular interest in applying a deeper understanding of statistics to laboratory experiments as well as data visualization.

title: Jim Rose’s Website
text:
My focus areas include:

Next generation sequencing data analysis

RNAseq, ATACseq, single-cell sequencing, whole-genome sequencing

Data Visualization

All things ggplot..trying my hand at a little Javascript/Observable/D3 recently

Applying biological know-how to design good questions for large complex data analysis
Gene regulatory network analysis
Epigenetics
